#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	long long x;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x;
		if(x==1)
		{
			cout<<x<<"\n";
			
		}
		else if(x==0)
		cout<<"3\n";
		else if(x%4==1||x%4==2)
		{cout<<"-1\n";
		}
		else if(x%4==0)
		{cout<<x<<"\n";
		}
		else{cout<<x-1<<"\n";
		}
	}  
	return 0;
}
